name: Remember (itch) (Salt_Mate)
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg.  With a new topic  every week, Game Design Students develop a prototype-like game to improve their GameDev skills by coming up with quick solutions with minimal resources.

The given topic for this project : "Gift a Game".

Description

This game is a present for every person, that might need a reminder in their life. Life can be very difficult and cruel towards a person and their mental health and you can play this, to get a small reminder. Out of own experience, I know that sometimes a person just have to hear or read that they are enough.
